snippet: A study shows that each day an average of 20 American children and adolescents end up in hospitals from gunfire.
abstract: Editorial draws attention to study published in Pediatric magazine finding that an average of 20 American children and adolescents end up in hospitals each day due to gunfire; holds study indicates national health crisis that is far more problematic, if less sensational, than massacres like the one that occurred in Newtown, Conn in 2012.
lead_paragraph: A study shows that each day an average of 20 American children and adolescents end up in hospitals from gunfire.
